A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Finn\, who was my favorite from the last movie\, was given a crap storyline that was made worse by the stupid casino scene. It felt like the monkeys in the fourth Indiana Jones to me. Too many stupid comedic characters/moments. Some are fine\, but Hux was too stupid for his rank. Chewie should have eaten those creatures. Poe's arc could have been better. I wanted interaction between Finn and Poe. Instead Finn went off on another adventure. Rose/Finn romance building was heavy handed. The elite is evil money mongerers was preachy and annoying.

I give this 2.5 because I loved half the movie: Rey\, Kylo\, and Luke's storyline. I liked Leia and Poe's interaction.

Phantasma was wasted and an unnecessary addition to the story with how they used her. Just a ploy to get GoT fans?
